languages.text: Эти боевые перчатки были изготовлены святым Когнацием для своего стража Аволиуса, голыми руками остановившего клинок убийцы. Увечья его навеки лишили Аволиуса возможности держать оружие, но в ближнем бою перчатки способны выстрелить в упор монолезвиями.

These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.
languages.original_text: Эти боевые перчатки были изготовлены святым Когнацием для своего стража Аволиуса, голыми руками остановившего клинок убийцы. Увечья его навеки лишили Аволиуса возможности держать оружие, но в ближнем бою перчатки способны выстрелить в упор монолезвиями.

traits.locale_text: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

languages.text: Estos guanteletes de guerra fueron creados por san Cognatius para Avolius, su protector, que detuvo la cuchilla de un asesino con las manos desnudas. Las espantosas heridas de Avolius le impedían volver a empuñar un arma, pero en distancias cortas los guanteletes pueden disparar monocuchillas a bocajarro.
languages.original_text: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

traits.locale_text: Estos guanteletes de guerra fueron creados por san Cognatius para Avolius, su protector, que detuvo la cuchilla de un asesino con las manos desnudas. Las espantosas heridas de Avolius le impedían volver a empuñar un arma, pero en distancias cortas los guanteletes pueden disparar monocuchillas a bocajarro.

languages.text: Ces gants de combat ont été fabriqués par Saint Cognatius à l'intention de son garde, Avolius, qui avait arrêté la lame d'un assassin à mains nues. Son sacrifice lui ayant valu de terribles blessures, il n'a jamais pu brandir une arme à nouveau, mais ces gants taillés pour le combat rapproché peuvent projeter des monolames à bout portant.
languages.original_text: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

traits.locale_text: Ces gants de combat ont été fabriqués par Saint Cognatius à l'intention de son garde, Avolius, qui avait arrêté la lame d'un assassin à mains nues. Son sacrifice lui ayant valu de terribles blessures, il n'a jamais pu brandir une arme à nouveau, mais ces gants taillés pour le combat rapproché peuvent projeter des monolames à bout portant.

languages.text: 圣科尼亚蒂乌斯为他的守卫阿沃硫斯制作的铁手套。阿沃硫斯曾为了保护主人，赤手空拳挡下了刺客的利刃。他因此受了重伤，无法再次拿起武器，但有了这双铁手套之后，可以在近身搏斗中射出致命的单分子利刃。
languages.original_text: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

traits.locale_text: 圣科尼亚蒂乌斯为他的守卫阿沃硫斯制作的铁手套。阿沃硫斯曾为了保护主人，赤手空拳挡下了刺客的利刃。他因此受了重伤，无法再次拿起武器，但有了这双铁手套之后，可以在近身搏斗中射出致命的单分子利刃。

languages.text: 暗殺者の刃を素手で止めた護衛のアヴォリウスのために、聖コグナティウスが製作した戦闘用ガントレット。アヴォリウスは重傷を負ったため、二度と武器を手にすることはできなかった。しかし、このガントレットによって、接近戦では至近距離からモノブレードを発射することができる。
languages.original_text: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

traits.locale_text: 暗殺者の刃を素手で止めた護衛のアヴォリウスのために、聖コグナティウスが製作した戦闘用ガントレット。アヴォリウスは重傷を負ったため、二度と武器を手にすることはできなかった。しかし、このガントレットによって、接近戦では至近距離からモノブレードを発射することができる。

languages.text: Diese Kampfhandschuhe wurden von St. Cognatius für seinen Leibwächter Avolius gefertigt, der die Klinge eines Attentäters mit bloßen Händen aufgehalten hatte. Avolius wurde dabei so schwer verletzt, dass er nie wieder eine Waffe in die Hand nehmen konnte. Die Handschuhe können jedoch im Nahkampf Monoklingen abfeuern.
languages.original_text: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.

traits.locale_text: Diese Kampfhandschuhe wurden von St. Cognatius für seinen Leibwächter Avolius gefertigt, der die Klinge eines Attentäters mit bloßen Händen aufgehalten hatte. Avolius wurde dabei so schwer verletzt, dass er nie wieder eine Waffe in die Hand nehmen konnte. Die Handschuhe können jedoch im Nahkampf Monoklingen abfeuern.

languages.text: Bu zırhlı savaş eldivenleri, Aziz Cognatius tarafından muhafızı Avolius için üretilmiştir. Avolius, bir suikastçının kılıcını çıplak elleriyle durdurmuş ve aldığı ağır yaralar yüzünden bir daha eline silah alamamıştır ancak yakın dövüşte bu zırheldivenler kısa mesafeden monobıçaklar fırlatabilir.
languages.original_text: These battle gauntlets were crafted by Saint Cognatius for his guard, Avolius, who had stopped an assassin's blade with his bare hands. Avolius's grievous injuries prevented him from ever picking up a weapon again, but in close combat, the gauntlets can fire monoblades at point blank range.
